name: ART Baseline
description: Baseline data elements for clients starting antiretroviral therapy (ART), including demographics, CD4 results, TB screening and prophylaxis at initiation.

name: ART Monthly
description: Monthly ART service data elements covering initiation, follow-up care, routine monitoring and service uptake.

name: ART Outcome
description: ART outcome data elements covering retention, transfers, mortality and other treatment outcomes.

name: CCMDD
description: Data elements supporting CCMDD enrolment, pickups and related monitoring.

name: Child and Nutrition
description: Child health and nutrition data elements covering priority conditions, growth and nutrition screening, and related outcomes.

name: Communicable Diseases
description: Data elements for priority communicable diseases, including service delivery and key outcomes.

name: DR-TB Quarterly
description: Quarterly data elements for drug-resistant TB case management, monitoring and outcomes.

name: DS-TB Quarterly
description: Quarterly data elements for drug-sensitive TB treatment monitoring and outcomes.

name: EMS
description: Emergency Medical Services data elements covering dispatch, response and patient transport activity.

name: EPI
description: Routine immunisation data elements covering doses given and vaccination coverage.

name: EPI Campaign
description: Campaign immunisation data elements for targeted vaccination drives and catch-up activities.

name: Environmental & Port Health
description: Environmental and port health data elements covering inspections, compliance monitoring and public health controls.

name: Eye Care
description: Eye care service data elements including screening, consultations and procedures.

name: HIV
description: HIV programme data elements covering testing, positivity and key prevention/service measures.

name: HPV Campaign
description: Data elements supporting HPV campaign delivery and monitoring.

name: Inpatient management
description: Data elements supporting inpatient service utilisation and outcomes.

name: Management PHC
description: PHC management data elements covering catchment/referral flows and facility operations.

name: Maternal and Neonatal
description: Maternal and newborn health data elements including ANC, deliveries and neonatal outcomes.

name: Mental Health
description: Mental health service data elements including consultations, admissions and follow-up care.

name: Non-Communicable Disease
description: NCD data elements covering screening, diagnosis, treatment monitoring and outcomes.

name: Oral Health
description: Oral health data elements covering dental service delivery and prevention activities.

name: Quality
description: Quality-of-care data elements supporting audit, performance monitoring and service improvement.

name: Rehabilitation
description: Data elements supporting rehabilitation service delivery and monitoring.

name: STI
description: Sexually transmitted infection data elements covering screening, diagnosis and treatment services.

name: School Health
description: School health data elements covering screening and health services delivered in schools.

name: TB Monthly
description: Data elements supporting routine TB monitoring and reporting.

name: Viral Hepatitis
description: Data elements supporting viral hepatitis screening and treatment monitoring.

name: WBPHCOT
description: WBPHCOT data elements covering household/community services, screening and referral activities.

name: Women's Health
